name: NATIXIS
membership: ESBG & EACB (via BPCE), EBF through FBF, EFAMA (via Natixis Investment Management), Insurance Europe through FFA (via Natixis Assurances), AFEP, AMAFI, AFME, ISDA, ICMA, ACI France, AFTI, UK Finance, FBF, Confrontation Europe, Paris Europlace.
goal:
Natixis is the international corporate and investment banking, asset management, insurance and payment arm of Group BPCE, the second-largest banking group in France.

For more information refer to our website www.natixis.com or to www.groupebpce.com
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Capital & banking market union, Sustainable finance, Brexit,  Market infrastructure & EMIR regulation, Corporate Law, Fit & Proper, MIFID/MIFIR, MAR/MAD, PRIIPS, Benchmark regulation & building a new Risk free rate, Solvency II, Prospectus, AIFM/UCIT, digital/crypto assets, payments, AML, CRR2/CRDV
